title: How to buy rp
body: I canÂ´t buy Riot point. When i try to i get declined, how do i buy riot points?

replies.body: We can look into this with you and try to figure out why your method of payment might be resulting in an error.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team will review this individually with you.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
